Intro: Hi, my name is Artem Kudryavtsev, I'm a photo enthusiast based in Switzerland.
Here you will find a collection of my best work capturing moments.
These photos were taken with digital cameras (Sony a6000, Sony A7III), mobile phone camera, film camera (Olympus XA), action camera and a drone.
Don't hesitate to contact me for any inquiries or collaborations concerning photography or if you want a similar website.

Photo.Footer: Do not hesitate to contact me for a better quality image
